name: Suspicious Northern Apple Stew
desc: A dish with braised meat and apples. Apart from a slight sourness, it tastes just like any other down-to-earth braised meat dish, and lacks any fruity aroma. One might even wonder if the apples were put in there at all.

value.text: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

customize.name: Recipe: Northern Apple Stew
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Northern Apple Stew.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Apple
customize.desc: Crisp and fragrant. Delicious raw or made into wine.

customize.name: Butter
customize.desc: An extract from milk. With the appropriate application, it can bring rich aromas to even the most basic ingredients.

customize.name: Pepper
customize.desc: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

customize.name: Northern Apple Stew
customize.desc: A dish with braised meat and apples. The meat goes down smooth, its flavor dense, and when cut open, the meat juice that flows out bears traces of apple flavoring. An eye-popping, refreshing dish indeed.

customize.name: Delicious Northern Apple Stew
customize.desc: A dish with braised meat and apples. The meat is juicy in the extreme, and no matter how much of it you eat, you still want more. The way every breath you take is tinged with the flavor of apples reminds you of nothing so much as lying in an apple orchard.
